EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Types of Einstein Personalization Analytics

The Personalization Intelligence app provides two types of analytics—Personalization pipeline intelligence and Personalization attribution intelligence.

Pipeline intelligence provides insights derived from activity associated with the Personalization request process. These analytics give details on how the Personalization app is performing using technical, operational performance metrics associated with inbound and outbound Personalization service requests.

Attribution intelligence provides insights on how visitor engagement with specific personalization points affect your business. Using attribution DMOs, attribution intelligence identifies where individual engagement actions directly affect business results, like maximizing revenue. By identifying which personalization experiences contribute most to business success, you can optimize how you provide personalized content to enhance customer satisfaction and drive business goals.

ANALYTICS TYPE	DESCRIPTION
Pipeline Intelligence	Provides metrics like the number of decision requests, number of personalization points, number of personalization decisions, and number of unique individuals targeted to highlight pipeline performance and health. View pipeline analytics using the Personalization Intelligence app in Analytics Studio.
Attribution Intelligence	Reports on more complex metrics, like attributed revenue and product orders that can be directly attributed to using a specific personalization point or other personalized content.
